com.example.ceandroid

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.ceandroid.Rule

  • public class Rule
extends Object
    The Rule classic is the underlying data structure for the entire program Causes and Effects, as well as other rule information, is stored within this object
    Author:
    CEandroid SMU

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int _id
      The Rule's Unique Identifier
      (package private) String _name
      _treeData Stores the boolean logic and Causes in a String _name Stores the Rule's name
      (package private) ArrayList<rCause> _ruleCauses
      Contains the List of rCauses
      (package private) ArrayList<rEffect> _ruleEffects
      Contains the List of rEffects
      (package private) String _treeData
      _treeData Stores the boolean logic and Causes in a String _name Stores the Rule's name
      (package private) boolean Active
      Stores whether or not the rule is currently active
      (package private) boolean edited
      Stores whether or not the rule is edited and needs to be updated in the Database
